definitions.definition: A bulbous plant of the genus Narcissus , with yellow flowers and a trumpet shaped corona , especially Narcissus pseudonarcissus , the national flower of Wales .
A brilliant yellow color, like that of a daffodil.

main_definition: ( countable ) A bulbous plant of the genus Narcissus , with yellow flowers and a trumpet shaped corona , especially Narcissus pseudonarcissus , the national flower of Wales .
secondary_definitions: A brilliant yellow color, like that of a daffodil.
